description:
Linux: born to be root.
Windows: born to reboot!

Is Google male or female?
Female, because it doesn't let you finish sentence before making a sugestion.
As I said before, I don't repeat myself.

The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe...
Is that it has never tried to contact us.

Be nice to people.
Being nice to all people is also a sign of maturity, class and intelligence.
Don't make offensive jokes.

How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb?
None. It's a hardware problem.
